text: The 2012 Quebec general election was held on September 4. Pauline Marois' Parti Québécois won a minority of seats and Jean Charest's Quebec Liberal Party formed the opposition. == Notes == Results change is compared to the Action démocratique du Québec in 2008. == References == Category:General elections in Canada Category:2010s elections in Canada Category:2010s in Quebec Category:2012 in North America Category:Elections in Quebec Category:September 2012 events
title: 2012 Quebec general election
